Thanks for catching that. Below is the regenerated **PKD Property Definitions & Requirements** table with all missing fields added. I've also reordered them for logical flow.

---

# **Personal Knowledge Database (PKD) - Property Definitions & Requirements**

### **Purpose**
The **Personal Knowledge Database (PKD)** serves as the **override layer** for AI decision-making. It captures **human overrides, insights, or corrections** that take precedence over AI's general knowledge. Entries in PKD **guide AI responses** and ensure decisions align with personalized strategies.

---

### **Property Table**

| **Property**                | **Type**         | **Required?**  | **Description** | **Comments/Questions** |
|-----------------------------|-----------------|---------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------|
| **Name**                    | Text            | 🟦 Required  | The title of the insight, decision, or override. | - |
| **Tags**                    | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | Categorization for filtering and indexing. | Ensures findability and grouping. |
| **Source**                  | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | Where this override came from (ChatGPT, Research, Mentor, etc.). | Adjusted to multi-select. |
| **Description**             | Text (Short)    | 🟦 Required  | A summary of the insight or override. | - |
| **Deep Dive**               | Text (Long)     | ❌ Not Required | In-depth reasoning behind the insight. | When additional context is needed. |
| **Priority Level**          | Select          | ❌ Not Required | Urgent, High, Medium, Low. | Urgent should be used **rarely** for critical overrides. |
| **AI Notes**                | Text (Long)     | ❌ Not Required | AI's explanation for why its original suggestion was different. | Helps track AI-human divergence. |
| **Creation Date**           | Date            | 🟦 Required  | When this override was created. | Auto-generated by system. |
| **Last Modified**           | Date            | ❌ Not Required | When this entry was last updated. | Tracks recency of overrides. |
| **Sourced From**            | Relation (Knowledge Vault) | ❌ Not Required | Links to relevant source material in the **Knowledge Vault**. | - |
| **Referenced by AI Workflows** | Relation (AI Workflows) | ❌ Not Required | Tracks where this override is actively being used. | Helps measure real-world impact. |
| **Review Needed**           | Checkbox        | ❌ Not Required | Flags an entry for review. | Used for AI-human alignment checks. |
| **Contradictory AI Response** | Text (Long)    | ❌ Not Required | AI's previous conflicting response before this override. | Helps track major shifts in AI recommendations. |
| **Knowledge Vault**         | Relation (Knowledge Vault) | ❌ Not Required | Links to related knowledge that supports the override. | - |

---

### **Key Updates Based on This Version**
✅ **Reordered fields for better logical grouping.**  
✅ **Multi-select Source instead of dropdown.**  
✅ **Added explicit linking to AI Workflows & Knowledge Vault.**  
✅ **Clarified Priority Level usage (Urgent = rare, critical cases).**  

---
